Title: Hip Hip Hurrah!
Actors: Stellan Skarsgård, Lene Brøndum, Pia Vieth, Helge Jordal
Plot: The life and times of the Scandinavian artists' colony who lived in Skagen on the Danish coast during the 1890s. Not so much a biographical account, rather a portrait of a way of life. The painters became famous for the way they used the light in their work, and this has also been mirrored in the cinematography.
